hypothesis_content.title: BTC Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a Bollinger Band width contraction below its 20-day average (squeeze) in a NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent directional breakout with >1.5x average volume will sustain for at least 48 hours, providing a tradable momentum move.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes in neutral markets represent compression of volatility that typically precedes expansion. Volume confirmation filters false breakouts. Neutral regimes provide cleaner technical setups without strong directional bias overwhelming the signal.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-day Bollinger Band width < 20-day average width (squeeze condition)
BTC price closes outside either Bollinger Band (breakout signal)
Volume on breakout day > 1.5x 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns inside Bollinger Bands OR 5% gain from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price reverses to opposite Bollinger Band
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakouts with volume confirmation fail to sustain >50% of the time OR show no statistical edge vs random entry in backtest.
